external_games.name: Sweets Mania: Candy Sugar Rush Match 3 Games

name: Sweets Mania: Candy Sugar Rush Match 3 Games
summary: Craving something sweet? Get your daily dose of sweets with a new delicious game for candy lovers! Try out a totally new match 3 game adventure featuring juicy candy elements to combine and eliminate, exciting boosters and missions, amazing blast effects and incredibly tasty graphics!
